channel.title: Front-End Web
channel.description: A playground for my experiments. To demonstrate my knowledge by writing blogs on some of the things I work.

item.title: My learning on cloud-computing!
item.description:
For the past few days as part of my job, I have been doing some new stuff related to cloud computing.
Thing I learned :

  • What is cloud instance?
  • Worked on EC2 instance
  • SSH remote instance to setup a jekyll site there etc.
